ROTICA-VIRGIFERA-VIRGIFERA; ELECTROANTENNOGRAM-ACTIVE COMPONENTS;
   SECONDARY PLANT-SUBSTANCES; MOTH UTETHEISA-ORNATRIX; POLLEN AMINO-ACIDS;
   PYRROLIZIDINE ALKALOIDS; BEETLES COLEOPTERA; CHRYSOMELIDAE ADULTS;
   FEEDING-BEHAVIOR; NUPTIAL GIFT
C1 Univ Delaware, Dept Entomol & Wildlife Ecol, Newark, DE 19717 USA.
